title: Hybrid Assassin Warwick Jungle Build

replies.body:
I've actually played this build before and it's pretty hilarious just one shotting any carry with your ult. xD
I rush Devourer and a Nashors tooth so it's basically like a more convential wits end start  except with cooldown instead of MR stealing. Then I just get a gunblade for the much needed lifesteal then Guinsoo's bla bla whatever, really fun build tho!

there is nobody more easily kiteable than warwick. theres pretty much a literal 1% chance of getting an enemy team and ally team comp where this build would be optimal for your game. after you use your Q its a 3.6 - 6 second CD, thats a long time. thats only for rank 5. before that you have a much larger CD. theres a lot more to say but ultimately, just please dont. the Q heal isnt worth it, warwick needs tanky stats

Anywhere below 5 second CD isn't long at all, maybe in quick skirmishes yes, but in lane and team fights it has a chance to be used 2 or 3 times. Also with a 1:1 scaling it's quite op. Say you had 200 ap and it did about 50 base damage. It heals for 80% so that's 200 health you heal back instantly. I say it's worth it.

200 AP means you have at least all 3 of your specified AP items, which means that the game is minimum 20 minutes in. 20 minutes in absolutely any ADC can destroy you in less than 5 seconds. 200 health on anybody means absolutely nothing at that point. again a lot more to say, but hey, you can always spam it in norms, since noone takes that seriously anyway :P
